title: How can a third world country rise to become a first world country? - Quora

response.answer_text: Round up all the socialist politicians and put them in prison. Find out what the people in your country can do, grow or create and give them the freedom to do that and keep the rewards of their labor. Find out which businesses/businessmen are exploiting their employees and put them in the same prison as the socialists. Find an international market for your commodities. Change doesn’t happen overnight, but those would be excellent first steps in the right direction.

The most direkt way is to apply membership in NATO. If you re accepted, you will be a first world country. Thats what for example Norway did. The two neighbouring countries Sweden and Finland refused NATO and remained third world countries.
Trade with rich countries ( the US sinceWWII) that buy what they make has been the most successful path to rapid economic growth for poor countries.
